solution_line_template: For {num_walls_6m} of the walls, Elijah will need {num_walls_6m} walls * {width_6m} meters each = <<{num_walls_6m}*{width_6m}={tape_for_6m_walls}>>{tape_for_6m_walls} meters of masking tape.
For the other {num_walls_4m} walls, he will need {num_walls_4m} walls * {width_4m} meters each = <<{num_walls_4m}*{width_4m}={tape_for_4m_walls}>>{tape_for_4m_walls} meters of masking tape.
He will therefore need a total of {tape_for_6m_walls} + {tape_for_4m_walls} = <<{tape_for_6m_walls}+{tape_for_4m_walls}={total_tape}>>{total_tape} meters of masking tape.
